column5: Took a awesome drive up to Perrault Falls.The falls were amazing and about as wild as I've seen them.Walked over to the launch and and water open due to current past Gawleys camp and Kingfisher.Weather turned great today.Tshirt and shorts day.https://youtu.be/gqVgnEicJPw
Couple of pics of 4public launch on Perrault side.Ice getting darker.
Wow. That's really moving, Should alleviate the low water conditions of the last couple years
Actually a bit to much now.Did send you a pm
Haha. Saw your message and thought I forgot to reply.
I will try to post a couple pictures tomorrow of last August when we walked through the south tunnel to Perrault. Later, Jay
These are from Mid August 2021. Later, Jay
Pretty calm for sure.Water was getting lower and lower.
